text: WASHINGTON Republicans in the U.S. Senate will go along with what President Donald Trump wants in coronavirus relief legislation, a White House spokeswoman said on Monday, as the White House pursues a deal with Democratic lawmakers.I believe Senate Republicans will ultimately come along with what the president wants - the president noted that yesterday, White House press secretary Kayleigh McEnany told Fox News. We believe Senate Republicans are not whats blocking this. It is Democrats.
